title: It's motor oil
description: This functioned as intended, it was a good price, it worked for the 5,000 miles I subjected it to.  The engine didn't blow up while using.  Maybe later it will, but the reason will an unknown.

title: High quality, always reliable
description:
I use this for my 2016 Mazda3 every 5,000 miles. The car runs great and I'm sure this motor oil plays a big part in that.
I will continue using this brand and product.
Highly recommend it.

title: Great engine protection
description: I use this oil in my 2016 Subaru Forester limited. I also use a Purolator Boss oil filter, and a magnetic oil pan drain plug. I over maintain my car, so I do annual oil and all my filters by time rather than mileage ! I do this because I drive less than 5,000 miles a year and consider that harder service on my car. The drained oil comes out very clean, and with no debris. Good luck and be safe.
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
